.. _pipeline:

Reduction Pipeline
==================
We first sort the images based on the filter used. We then clean and stack the images, align them, and finally add astrometry.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2


Sort Filters Module
-------------------
.. automodule:: sort_filters
    :members:


Stack and Clean Wrapper Module
------------------------------
.. automodule:: stack_and_clean
    :members:

Align Filters Module
--------------------
.. automodule:: Align
    :members:


Astrometry Module
-----------------
.. automodule:: astrometry
    :members:
